üìå Dashboard Visualization Guide
üîπ Alarm Indicator (1 or 0):
The displayed values (1 or 0) simply indicate whether there are warning or critical alarms in the cluster. They do not reflect the exact number of alarms.

üìç How to Get More Details?
To check which specific alarms are active in a cluster, go to the Cluster Overview section, where you‚Äôll find detailed alarm information.

‚úÖ Purpose of This Indicator:
This indicator is designed to provide a quick and simple visualization of the cluster status, helping you identify potential issues at a glance.

‚ö† Important:

The Critical & Warnings displayed in the "Cluster Alarms" widget include both Nutanix cluster alarms and custom monitors.
The "Cluster Warning Status" and "Cluster Critical Status" widgets reflect the direct health status of the Nutanix cluster itself.
